name: LeagueTrendz
about: An NBA application providing users with a comprehensive platform to explore stats, team performances, and follow their favorite players and teams with data from the 2023-24 season and past seasons in the NBA.

name: Drink 4 The Kids
about: A mobile-first web app and POS system built for the 5th annual D4K charity party. We raised over $27,000 supporting The Nicholas House and True Change charities in Atlanta. With 200+ unique users, 500+ orders placed, and 600+ drinks made, we continue improving the system each year to enhance the eventâ€™s success.

name: SwoleMates
about: A social media app for fitness enthusiasts. Users can create posts and workouts, add friends, and like/comment on their friends' content.

name: GetFit
about: A web app for fitness enthusiasts to track their main lifts and create custom workout routines.

name: Job Tracker
about: A responsive web app designed for users to easily keep track of any job they apply to during their search.

name: Quizard
about: A Quizlet clone, designed for users to create their own quizzes to fit their studying needs.
